not_migrated.title: Not Migrated
not_migrated.description: The server's node is not yet setup from migration.

invalid_license.title: Invalid License
invalid_license.description: The server's node doesn't have a valid license key linked to it - please contact the panel owner.

moving.title: Server Moving
moving.description: Server is currently being moved to a new node.

suspended.title: Server Suspended
suspended.description: Server is currently suspended and can not be accessed until unsuspended.

install_failed.title: Install Failed
install_failed.description: Server failed the installation process. Contact support.

updating.title: Server Updating
updating.description: Server is currently completing update process.

backup_creating.title: Backup In-progress
backup_creating.description: Server is currently taking a backup.

console.eula_notice: By pressing 'I Accept' below you are indicating your agreement to the Mojang EULA.

logs.upload_logs_description: Would you like to upload your logs so that they could be shared?
logs.upload_complete: Your logs have been uploaded at: {url}
logs.upload_failed: Something went wrong while trying to upload server logs. Try again later.

details.name_description: Server name visible in the panel. This doesn't change the actual server hostname, only how its identified in the panel.
details.updated: Your server's details has been updated!

sftp.alert_note: The SFTP password is the password that you use to login to the panel. Ensure that your client is set to use SFTP and not FTP or FTPS for connections, there is a difference between the protocols.

audit_logs.no_audits_description: Seems like you have no audit logs. Perform some actions on your server to generate and see an overview of what's happening to your server here.

changes.hidden_value: Changed {key} to a new hidden value

files.delete_following: Are you sure you want to delete the following files? Deleting files is an irreversible operation which can not be undone unless you have taken backups.
files.upload_unavailable: Uploading files is currently unavailable, try again later or try using SFTP.
files.upload_too_large: Unable to upload the file {name} due to being too large, please use SFTP instead.
files.too_many_results: We found too many results for the search term. Please be more specific to be able to see all the results.
files.cloned_repository: The repository {repository} has been cloned into {path}.
files.git_pull_description: Pull the latest changes of the repository in the current directory.
files.pulled_repository: The repository was pulled and the latest commit is {commit}.
files.git_auth_required: This repository requires authentication, please provide your personal access token.
files.steam_workshop_finished: The workshop item has been downloaded.
files.steam_workshop_n_more: And no more items... | And {n} more item... | And {n} more items...

databases.title: Databases
databases.delete_database_notice: Are you sure that you want to delete the {name} database? There is no going back, all data will immediately be removed.
databases.host_footer: This should be the host the database should be deployed on.
databases.name_footer: This should be the database name you want to use.
databases.connections_from_footer: This should reflect the IP address that connections are allowed from. Uses standard MySQL notation. If unsure leave as %.

exceptions.too_many: You have already reached the quota of allowed databases for this server.
exceptions.duplicate: There is already a database created using your given name for this server.
exceptions.no_suitable_host: No database host was found that meets the requirements for this server.

subusers.title: Manage Users
subusers.delete_subuser_notice: This will immediately remove {name} ({email}) from this server and revoke all permissions.
subusers.subuser_added: Successfully added the user as a subuser for this server. We've sent them an email with instructions on how to finish setting up their account.
subusers.cant_add_owner: You cannot add the server owner as a subuser for this server.
subusers.subuser_already_exists: A user with that email address is already assigned as a subuser for this server.

allocations.help_description: The list to the left includes all available IPs and ports that are open for your server to use for incoming connections.

startup.variable_not_editable_admin: This variable is not user editable - though as you are an admin, you can update it within the admin area for this server.
startup.variable_not_editable: This variable is not user editable.

backups.create_warning: Creating a new backup will stop the server if it's already running
backups.already_creating: A backup is already being created.
backups.creation_would_exceed_limit: Creating this backup would exceed the server's backup limit.
backups.throttled: You can only create 2 backups over the time period of 10 minutes.
backups.cant_delete_locked: You must unlock the backup before attempting to delete it.
backups.delete_backup_notice: Are you sure that you want to delete the {name} backup? There is no going back, all data will immediately be removed.

schedules.name: Schedules
schedules.delete_notice: Please confirm you want to delete the "{name}" schedule by repeating the name in the input below. This is an irreversible action which can not be undone.
schedules.delete_task_notice: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This is an irreversible action.
schedules.enabled_footer: Whether the schedule is enabled or not.
schedules.invalid_cron: Use a valid cron expression to view description and next run time.
schedules.chain_interval_too_long: The maximum interval time for a chained task is 15 minutes.

support.description: This will allow Support OP's on this panel to access your server until it is disabled again.
support.enable_access_alert: Support OP Access has been enabled for this server.
support.disable_access_alert: Support OP Access has been disabled for this server.

updater.description: This will update the server. This may take a while and will lock your server while its updating. NOTE: Any modifications to the game's base files could be overwritten by the update.
updater.no_script: This egg has no update script available.

monitor.description: Monitors your server, and automatically restarts it if it's detected unresponsive for 15 seconds. NOTE: Some games may not support this and will do nothing.
monitor.toggled: The health monitor has been successfully toggled.

install_edition.description: This will install different edition of Minecraft of your choice on the server.
install_edition.format_footer: All server files will be DELETED (some editions may not work with existing files)

reinstall.description: This will reinstall the server, potentially overwriting some files during this process. Before proceeding, please make sure to back up all important files.

subdomains.title: Subdomains
subdomains.name_footer: The vanity name of the subdomain.
subdomains.domain_footer: The domain which the subdomain will be created on.
subdomains.allocation_footer: The allocation which the subdomain will point towards.
subdomains.delete_subdomain_notice: Are you sure that you want to delete the {name} subdomain? All connections using this subdomain will no longer work.

backdoor_scanner.show_non_high_severity: Do you want to show non-high severity results?
backdoor_scanner.reliability_warning: This tool assumes you have knowledge of Lua and how backdoors function. The results found aren't guaranteed to be actual backdoors and thus require manual verification.

hardcoded_steamid.title: Hardcoded SteamID
hardcoded_steamid.description: Used often for hardcoding permissions only for specific person, or just for crediting own work.

arbitrary_code_execution.title: Arbitrary Code Execution
arbitrary_code_execution.description: Used often to run malicious code, or to run a DRM.

external_networking.title: External Networking
external_networking.description: Used to get info from external source, like latest version or possibly a backdoor to run code.

set_usergroup.title: Set Usergroup
set_usergroup.description: Used to set player's usergroup in-game to a specific rank.

_g_access.title: _G Access
_g_access.description: Can be used to get any global variable, often used to hide what function is getting called.

getfenv.title: getfenv Usage
getfenv.description: Can be potentially used to get _G

string_char.title: string.char
string_char.description: Used to create a string from bytes, often used alongside with obfuscated code.

console_command.title: Console Command
console_command.description: Runs console command either as a client or a server.

ulx_in_a_string.title: ULX in a string
ulx_in_a_string.description: Often used in backdoors to set ranks or do other things with ULX.

ip_tracking.title: IP Tracking
ip_tracking.description: Allows getting IP address either of the server or a client.

massive_indentation.title: Massive Indentation
massive_indentation.description: Possible attempt at hiding a backdoor.

sendlua.title: SendLua
sendlua.description: Can be used to send malicious code to a client.

fastdl.note: This will sync all your FastDL content from the game server, compress it and upload to our web server. Everything inside the garrysmod/, garrysmod/addons/ and garrysmod/gamemodes/ folder that contains downloadable content will be synced.
fastdl.enable_fastdl: To enable FastDL for your server after a sync, you need to add {code} into your {file} file.
fastdl.sync_started: FastDL is now syncing. You will be notified when it finishes.

modpacks.install_warning: You are about to install {modpack}, this is an operation which may overwrite existing files & can not be reversed.
modpacks.format_footer: Ticking the format option means that all existing files will be deleted before installing the modpack.
modpacks.installing: The modpack is now installing. You will be notified when it's finished.

minecraft.edition_installing: The edition is now installing, you will be notified when it's finished.
